Package index

All functions

BOSSS_problem()
Create a BOSSS problem
BOSSS_solution()
Create an initial solution to a BOSSS problem
constraints()
Create a set of constraints
design_space()
Create a design space
diag_check_point()
Empirical check
diag_plots()
Plot one-dimensional model fits
diag_predictions()
Examine model predictions
extend_initial()
Extend the initial set of design evaluations
hypotheses()
Create a set of hypotheses
iterate()
Perform one iteration of Bayesian optimisation
objectives()
Create a set of objectives
plot(<BOSSS_solution>)
Plot the Pareto front of a BOSSS solution
print(<BOSSS_solution>)
Print the Pareto set of a BOSSS solution
sensitivity()
Run a one-dimensional sensitivity analysis
update_constraint()
Update problem constraints
